EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/breaking-the-monolith]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming webinar Breaking the Monolith on Friday, August 26, 2016.
Please see event details below: Date: Friday, August 26, 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}} Time: 11:00amâ€“12:00pm PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1190422/2B5BECF5845424730286C5CACAAAA5BF]]>

We look forward to you joining us.
The Pivotal Team
